```{r echo = F}

# load data
df <- read_csv("mfq_cosine_rq1.csv")

df$Chinese_ppt <- ifelse(df$human_nation == "China", 0.5, -0.5)
df$Chinese_ppt <- df$Chinese_ppt - mean(df$Chinese_ppt)

df$Chinese_mean <- ifelse(df$LLM == "Human mean, China", 0.5, -0.5)

for (llm in unique(filter(df, str_sub(LLM, 1, 5) != "Human")$LLM)) {
  
  print(llm)
  
  print(summary(lm(
    cosine ~ Chinese_ppt * Chinese_mean,
    filter(df, LLM %in% c(llm, "Human mean, China"))
  )))
  
}

```
